issue.title: Metadata assignation
issue.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Metadata in progress can be assigned by a metadata editor to any other metadata editor which has rights to work on the corresponding resource.
Assignation can be done by selecting the metadata editor, adding some information and assigning optionally child metadata.

When assigned, an email notification is sent.
All assignments are stored and could be consulted.
Assigning metadata edition doesn't block edition to the defined metadata editor; all other metadata editors can always work on it.

Such feature is not voted as it does already exist in previous easySDI version.

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0
